cc_c_egir2_1.name: Special Bonus
cc_c_egir2_1.desc: For every <$cc.t.egir><@cc.kw>Abyssal Hunter</></> operator stationed in a Factory, the Control Center provides <@cc.vup>5%</> Productivity for every Factory with an <$cc.t.egir><@cc.kw>Abyssal Hunter</></> operator stationed within it, up to a maximum of <@cc.vup>45%</> Productivity for a single Factory

cc_c_egir2_2.name: Special Bonus
cc_c_egir2_2.desc: For every <$cc.t.egir><@cc.kw>Abyssal Hunter</></> operator stationed in a Factory, the Control Center provides <@cc.vup>10%</> Productivity for every Factory with an <$cc.t.egir><@cc.kw>Abyssal Hunter</></> operator stationed within it, up to a maximum of <@cc.vup>90%</> Productivity for a single Factory

cc_c_egir2_3.name: Special Interaction Rules
cc_c_egir2_3.desc:
Takes priority over <$cc.m.var2><@cc.rem>Cooperative Will</></>, and does not stack
Does not stack with <$cc.m.pow1><@cc.rem>Automation α</></>, <$cc.m.pow2><@cc.rem>Automation β</></>, or <$cc.m.pow3><@cc.rem>Bionic Seadragon</></>, and the 'set to 0' effect will take priority

cc_m_pow1.name: Automation α
cc_m_pow1.desc:
Provided by the following Operator(s):
Weedy, Eunectes, Passenger

cc_m_pow2.name: Automation β
cc_m_pow2.desc:
Provided by the following Operator(s):
Eunectes

cc_m_pow3.name: Bionic Seadragon
cc_m_pow3.desc:
Provided by the following Operator(s):
Weedy
